name: The Adventures of Traveling Troy
description:
The Adventures of Traveling Troy  (Prototype Build  V1.3 - 12/16/20) |   Best experienced in Firefox.   |    To replay please reload the browser    | Known Issues:
  • Story video not loading
  • Loosing Key Input
  • Poor Edge performance
  • Player run animation issues (level 2)
  • Level 1 not resetting after finishing the game
  • Chrome speeding up game
